mapper.sql: id, awardtitle, awardbrief, awardcateid, awardprice, awardlevel, awardphotos, awardtype, createtime, updatetime
mapper.select:
select
FROM award a JOIN awardclassify ac ON a.awardcateid = ac.id where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},classifyname

SELECT a.id, awardtitle, awardbrief, awardcateid, awardprice, awardlevel, awardphotos, awardtype, a.createtime, a.updatetime,classifyname FROM award a JOIN awardclassify ac ON a.awardcateid = ac.id WHERE 1=1
AND awardtitle LIKE concat(concat('%',#{award.awardtitle}),'%')
ORDER BY a.createtime DESC
limit #{startno},#{pagesize}
mapper.insert: insert into award (id, awardtitle, awardbrief, awardcateid, awardprice, awardlevel, awardphotos, awardtype, createtime, updatetime) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{awardtitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{awardbrief,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{awardcateid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{awardprice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{awardlevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{awardphotos,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{awardtype,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into award
id,
awardtitle,
awardbrief,
awardcateid,
awardprice,
awardlevel,
awardphotos,
awardtype,
createtime,
updatetime,

mapper.update:
update award
awardtitle = #{awardtitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
awardbrief = #{awardbrief,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
awardcateid = #{awardcateid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
awardprice = #{awardprice,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
awardlevel = #{awardlevel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
awardphotos = #{awardphotos,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
awardtype = #{awardtype,jdbcType=CHAR},
createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updatetime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update award set awardtitle = #{awardtitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, awardbrief = #{awardbrief,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, awardcateid = #{awardcateid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, awardprice = #{awardprice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, awardlevel = #{awardlevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, awardphotos = #{awardphotos,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, awardtype = #{awardtype,jdbcType=CHAR}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updatetime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
